View Javadoc

1   package ch.akuhn.matrix;
2   
3   import java.util.Arrays;
4   
5   /**
6    * Matrix where <CODE>a<SUB>ij</SUB> = a<SUB>ji</SUB></CODE> for all elements.
7    * <P>
8    * 
9    * @author Adrian Kuhn
10   * 
11   */
12  public class SymmetricMatrix extends DenseMatrix {
13  
14  	/**
15  	 * Construct with given size
16  	 * 
17  	 * @param size
18  	 */
19  	public SymmetricMatrix(int size) {
20  		super(size, size);
21  	}
22  
23  	/**
24  	 * Construct with given values, which must be jagged and represent the lower
25  	 * triangular values
26  	 * 
27  	 * @param values
28  	 */
29  	public SymmetricMatrix(double[][] values) {
30  		super(values);
31  	}
32  
33  	@Override
34  	protected void assertInvariant() throws IllegalArgumentException {
35  		for (int n = 0; n < values.length; n++) {
36  			if (values[n].length != (n + 1))
37  				throw new IllegalArgumentException();
38  		}
39  	}
40  
41  	@Override
42  	protected double[][] makeValues(int rows, int columns) {
43  		assert rows == columns;
44  		final double[][] values = new double[rows][];
45  		for (int n = 0; n < values.length; n++)
46  			values[n] = new double[n + 1];
47  		return values;
48  	}
49  
50  	@Override
51  	public int columnCount() {
52  		return rowCount();
53  	}
54  
55  	@Override
56  	public double get(int row, int column) {
57  		return row > column ? values[row][column] : values[column][row];
58  	}
59  
60  	@Override
61  	public double put(int row, int column, double value) {
62  		return row > column ? (values[row][column] = value) : (values[column][row] = value);
63  	}
64  
65  	@Override
66  	public int rowCount() {
67  		return values.length;
68  	}
69  
70  	/**
71  	 * Create from a square matrix
72  	 * 
73  	 * @param square
74  	 * @return the matrix
75  	 */
76  	public static DenseMatrix fromSquare(double[][] square) {
77  		final double[][] jagged = new double[square.length][];
78  		for (int i = 0; i < jagged.length; i++) {
79  			assert square[i].length == square.length;
80  			jagged[i] = Arrays.copyOf(square[i], i + 1);
81  		}
82  		return new SymmetricMatrix(jagged);
83  	}
84  
85  	/**
86  	 * Create from jagged low triangular values
87  	 * 
88  	 * @param values
89  	 * @return the matrix
90  	 */
91  	public static DenseMatrix fromJagged(double[][] values) {
92  		return new SymmetricMatrix(values);
93  	}
94  
95  	@Override
96  	public double[][] unwrap() {
97  		return values;
98  	}
99  
100 	@Override
101 	public double[] rowwiseMean() {
102 		final double[] mean = new double[rowCount()];
103 		for (int i = 0; i < values.length; i++) {
104 			for (int j = 0; j < i; j++) {
105 				mean[i] += values[i][j];
106 				mean[j] += values[i][j];
107 			}
108 		}
109 		for (int n = 0; n < mean.length; n++)
110 			mean[n] /= mean.length;
111 		return mean;
112 	}
113 
114 	@Override
115 	public Vector mult(Vector v) {
116 		assert v.size() == values.length;
117 		final double[] mult = new double[v.size()];
118 		for (int i = 0; i < values.length; i++) {
119 			for (int j = 0; j < i; j++) {
120 				mult[i] += values[i][j] * v.get(j);
121 				mult[j] += values[i][j] * v.get(i);
122 			}
123 		}
124 		return Vector.wrap(mult);
125 	}
126 
127 }
